definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be, or grow, insignificant (‖[[זער]]; NH id., As. ṣeḫêru, be small, Ar. s.agura id.;; Syr. s.9ar be insignificant, despicable; Targum [[חְעַר]] trans.despise, revile;—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. (opp. [[כָּבֵד]]), 3 mpl. [[יִחְעֲרוּ]] Job 14:21, [[יִחְעָָרוּ]] Je 30:19; Pt. as subst. [[הַצּׂעֲרִים]] Zec 13:7 (i.e. sheep, in fig., cf. Now).
